name: Coping with Election Stress & Anxiety
description: So many of us are experiencing election anxiety which is mixed with social isolation because of the pandemic. I put together this short list of ways to try and cope with all of the uncertainty we're experiencing and hope any little bit of it sparks ideas and hope. Now more than ever it's important to lean into things that bring us any amount of joy. Clearly making little infographics in Figma is my coping mechanism, what's yours?
